EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2017-03-22-Cloud Secrets Webinar Series-5 Stages of Cloud Adoption.EMAIL-Fol
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Watch the {{my.Webinar Title}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Sorry we missed you at our {{my.Webinar Title}}. We get it, things come up and days get busy. Fear not though, for there is a recording of the webinar that you can view at your leisure. You can find the recording here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/videos/1380]]>. If you have any questions about the webinar please reach out to your account representative or marketing@turbonomic.com. -The Turbonomic Team
